hero.title: Pricing & Commission
hero.subtitle: Sell online on ArcNxt at 0% commission across all categories

eligibility.title: Donâ€™t have a GSTIN?
eligibility.desc: Selected seller categories may onboard without a regular GSTIN.

noFees.title: No Registration Fee
noFees.desc: Creating a seller account and listing products on ArcNxt is completely free.

noFees.title: Free Product Listing
noFees.desc: List unlimited products without paying any listing charges.

noFees.title: No Collection Fee
noFees.desc: Keep 100% of your sale price on prepaid and COD orders.

noFees.title: No Penalty Charges
noFees.desc: No penalties for order cancellations or delayed dispatch.

payment.title: Payment Cycle
payment.description: The settlement amount is securely deposited directly into your bank account after order delivery, including cash on delivery orders.

points.title: 7-day payment cycle
points.desc: Payments are settled within 7 days from order delivery.

points.title: Secured payment
points.desc: All settlements are safely transferred to your registered bank account.

payment.footer: You can track deposited balance and upcoming settlements from your seller dashboard.

shipping.title: Quick Facts on Shipping & Delivery
shipping.description: ArcNxt manages shipping and delivery so you can focus on selling. Shipping charges attract only applicable GST, while you retain full control over your product pricing and reach customers across India.

facts.text: Pan-India delivery coverage through reliable courier partners.
GST is applicable only on shipping charges.
Sellers have complete control over product pricing.

returns.title: Returns Management
returns.description: All returns are transparently visible in your seller dashboard, helping you track inventory, take corrective action, and reduce future returns.

facts.text: Real-time visibility of returns in the seller panel.
Improve listings and operations to minimize return rates.

cancellation.title: Cancellations
cancellation.description: There are no penalties for seller-initiated or system cancellations. Sellers can operate without fear of unexpected charges due to inventory or operational issues.

rto.title: Return to Origin (RTO)
rto.description: If delivery attempts are unsuccessful, the shipment is returned to you without any return shipping charges.

finalCta.title: Sell Products Online at 0% Commission
finalCta.subtitle: Join a seller-first marketplace built for growth

items.title: Fast Onboarding
items.desc: Start selling quickly with a simple and hassle-free onboarding process.

items.title: Zero Commission
items.desc: No commission on sales. Keep 100% of what you earn.

items.title: Easy Order Management
items.desc: Manage orders, returns, and inventory from one simple dashboard.

items.title: Secure Payments
items.desc: Get paid directly into your bank account with transparent settlements.

items.title: Business Growth
items.desc: Reach customers across India and grow your online business.
